thanks_title: Thank you for this great solidarity!
thanks_msg:
We wholeheartedly thank everyone who worked, supported, showed solidarity, donated, and made sacrifices in their own lives for our child Furkan.

To all our volunteers who multiply kindness and call for kindness... Each and every one of you are heroes who held Furkan's hand.

May God be pleased with all of you. Thank goodness you exist, thank goodness you didn't leave us alone.
timeline_step1_desc: Our challenging but hopeful journey began. We united for Furkan's treatment.
timeline_step2_desc: With the support of thousands of volunteers and donors, we rapidly approached our fundraising goal.
timeline_step3_desc: Hope grew with fundraising events, donations, and shares.
timeline_step4_desc: Furkan's dream turned into reality. DMD didn't win, Furkan did. Treatment fundraising goal achieved!
share_desc: Let's reach more people by sharing this success story.
